remarks: Domain and co-domain of the mapping operation; deduction form.  This version of ~ fmptd uses bound-variable hypothesis instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Mar-2017.)
statement:
fmptdF.p $e |- F/ x ph $.
fmptdF.a $e |- F/_ x A $.
fmptdF.c $e |- F/_ x C $.
fmptdF.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. C ) $.
fmptdF.2 $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
fmptdF $p |- ( ph -> F : A --> C ) $.
